body:
Hey guys. PeachyYas gave me a new account, and this is the name. I hated my old name, so this is my new one. Feel free to still call me Jake, JakeFromStateFarm, etc. But just so you know this is me. 

Cheers! <3

replies.body:
Doing something Aversively means to do something half hearted, cold blooded, etc. Being aversive is to be apathetic. So it's not really random, it has a meaning xP

And tino, neither will I. That account does hold some great memories. I'll still be keeping it and using it every so often. However this will be my main account.

I'm still the same ol' Jake from StateFarm. I always will be, no matter what my username is. c:
